PAD_Event3.synopsis: The party encounter another Brainquake Event, the ground shakes up again, they comment on this happening once more. This time they already know it's Netherbrain, but not WHY.

PAD_Event2.synopsis: The party encounter the second Brainquake Event, the ground shakes up again, they comment on this happening once more. Emperor's AD follows up this event.

DaisyAD_Event3.synopsis: During another Brainquake Event the Emperor comments once more, this time telling that the Netherbrain causing this because the Absolute is losing control over it.

DaisyAD_Event2.synopsis: During the second Brainquake Event the Emperor comments of the happening, revealing that is is caused by the Netherbrain, but not yet WHY.

PAD_Event1.synopsis: The first Brainquake Event PAD. The party feels the rumble of the ground underneath, but they are unsure what causes this yet. (In truth, it is caused by the Netherbrain, but the party doesn't know this yet.)

DaisyAD_Event3_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
DaisyAD_Event3_0.text: The brain appears to be resisting its masters - it's acting of its own will...?

DaisyAD_Event3_1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
DaisyAD_Event3_1.text: The brain is resisting its masters... Gortash was right. Without all three stones to control it, it's breaking free.

DaisyAD_Event3_2.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
DaisyAD_Event3_2.text: The brain is resisting its orders... Without all three stones to control it, it will soon start acting on its own will.

DaisyAD_Event2_0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
DaisyAD_Event2_0.text: It's the elder brain - there's something... happening to it.

PAD_Event1_1.speaker: Player
PAD_Event1_1.text: What in the Hells was that?
PAD_Event1_1.context: InternalNodeContext: Surprised: "What in the Hells was that?"

PAD_Event1_2.speaker: Player
PAD_Event1_2.text: Felt like an earthquake - as if I didn't have problems enough already.
PAD_Event1_2.context: InternalNodeContext: Practical: "It can't be the Absolute army yet - we arrived well ahead of them!"

PAD_Event1_0.speaker: Player
PAD_Event1_0.text: Felt like an earthquake - as if I didn't have problems enough already.
PAD_Event1_0.context:
InternalNodeContext: Single speaker version (copy of N10)
Practical: "It can't be the Absolute army yet - we arrived well ahead of them!"
